entry.title: Sharing this again because we aren’t hearing nearly enough...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Sharing this again because we aren’t hearing nearly enough noise on this 🔊
Will post action steps later today.
#StopWarOnTigray #SayNoToWarEthiopia

+3Tigray Communities

What’s Happening in Northern Ethiopia (Tigray)?

With the war that is currently being waged against the people of Tigray, it is essential that we be the voice f...or our voiceless Tigrayan brothers and sisters back home. The infographic below provides a brief summary of what’s going on, the events that have led up to this point, and what we can do to make a difference!

Please refer to the following link (https://linktr.ee/istandwithtigray) for a full list of resources in the fight for our people including the Campaign for Peace petition and “I STAND WITH TIGRAY 2020” Google Drive folder which houses email templates, phone scripts, and contact information for organizations and elected officials.

Let’s come together to support our people! #IStandWithTigray ❤️💛✊🏾

Millete Birhanemaskel

#TigrayGenocide day 11

The sugar factory in Tigray was bombed
Airport in Bahir Dar bombed
Airport in Gondar bombed...
Three Missile strikes in Eritrea

The geopolitics are complex here. When will we stop this?!

entry.title: For the record his BAC was .319 and any of us would have our...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

For the record his BAC was .319 and any of us would have our license suspended for this. Instead Velez will be back at work in 10 funky little days ruining people’s lives for the same. Tax dollars hard at work y’all. #DefundThePolice

Deputy Jonathan Velez's suspension for the incident will last 10 days, without pay.

9news.com

Denver sheriff's deputy suspended after crashing car while drunk with a minor, discipline letter says

Deputy Jonathan Velez's suspension for the incident will last 10 days, without pay.Deputy Jonathan Velez's suspension for the incident will last 10 days, without pay.

entry.title: #CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of #justiceforBlacklives, the justice system is still being weaponized against us in real time. With the entire world hyper-focused on racial injustice white supremacists have doubled down in full confidence that they will be protected by the justice department above all else. Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty is functioning as ...

Continue Reading

Black Lives Matter 5280

✊🏾✊🏾✊🏾

BLM 5280 Freedom School

After hearing that the Boulder Valley school board was having a vote on removing SRO’s from their schools last night, one of our brilliant and passionate studen...ts took it upon himself to email the board reminding them of a letter he sent back in July! One of our 2020 Freedom School summer classes helped students write letters to local representatives expressing their stance on issues important to them. We are so proud of D for taking the initiative then and now to address such an important and impactful issue! Powerful words, D! ✊🏽

Sanna Alice Nanna-Andraste

entry.title: #DEMANDS...
entry.content:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism.
